text: Kampong Cham is a province (khaet) of Cambodia. Its capital and largest city is also named Kampong Cham. Kampong Cham was divided into two provinces on 31 December 2013. All land west of the Mekong River remained Kampong Cham. Land east of the river became Tboung Khmum Province. There are 9 districts and 1 municipality: *Batheay *Chamkar Leu *Cheung Prey *Kampong Cham Municipality *Kampong Siem *Kang Meas *Koh Sotin *Prey Chhor *Srey Santhor *Steung Trang ==References== Category:Provinces of Cambodia Category:Establishments in Cambodia Category:1885 establishments in Asia
title: Kampong Cham province
